snippet: An appeals court in San Francisco threw out a convicted terrorist’s lawsuit accusing a Bush administration lawyer who wrote the so-called torture memos of authorizing illegally harsh treatment of “enemy combatants.”
abstract: San Francisco appeals court throws out lawsuit brought by convicted terrorist Jose Padilla against John Yoo, high-ranking Bush administration lawyer who wrote the so-called torture memos authorizing waterboarding and other interrogation techniques for enemy combatants.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court in San Francisco threw out a convicted terrorist’s lawsuit accusing a Bush administration lawyer who wrote the so-called torture memos of authorizing illegally harsh treatment of “enemy combatants.”

headline.seo: Lawsuit Against John Yoo Is Thrown Out
headline.main: California: Court Throws Out Suit Against Bush Lawyer
headline.print_headline: California: Court Throws Out Suit Against Bush Lawyer
